page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN CONSETT
page.content: Unemployment has risen steeply since Consett steel works closed down in 1980.The unemployment figures for 1985 has risen 128 to 7,788 but many jobs have been provided by building an industrial estate.These are some of the jobs that brought employment. Distributers of lawn mowers, Sailing boat manufacters,Pine furniture, Replacement windows and doors, manufactures of confectionery,and last of all Electrack-electric fittings. Most people have to commute out of their villages to get to work.Shotley Bridge hospital is the biggest place of employment,over 1,000 people are employed and another place of employment makes model aeroplanes in Shotley Bridge village. Also the Detention Centre in Medomsley employs over one hundred people.That includes officers and cleaners.
